title: Big doings
creator_credit: Mayfair Pictures, Jules Bernstein and Dallas M. Fitzgerald
brief_description: A performance of Ethel Meglin’s Famous Hollywood Wonderkiddies at the Tiny Tots Theater, Hollywood. Features dances and songs by the Tiny Tots in an unintentionally funny performance.
